short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: üöÄ Introducing Pixefy ‚Äì a simple yet powerful tool to transform your workflow in testing for responsive websites and applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìå Open beta
You might run into a few bugs, and we'll be launching new features all the time.

‚úç To give feedback, request a feature or report a bug use the link below:
   ->   https://www.pixefy.io/feedback   üëâ Your feedback is crucial to our improvement üôè

‚ú® Want to see what's new? 
   ->   https://www.pixefy.io/changelog


üî• Key Features:

* Layout Testing
Check how your website looks on different screens in a single browser tab.

* Mouse Actions Sync
Synchronized scroll and click mouse actions throuth all panes.

* User Agents
Switch or upload user agents to test websites across devices with ease.

* Measure Distance
Quickly and easily measure the distance between elements.

* Inspect Element
Hover to view all key values. Click to change or compare values between elements.

* Screenshots
Snap full page, visible sections, or custom selections. Preview and download them easily.

* Content Adjustments
Make your website edits by easily changing text and images.

* X-Frame-Options
Remove restrictions to display content from websites that don't load in iFrames. 
**‚ö†Ô∏è Be aware of the security implications**

* Viewport measurements
Instantly see the updated measurements of the current page as you resize your browser tab.


üìò What is it made for?
It's for QA engineers, UX/UI designers, Front end developers, Marketing managers & Business owners
